sentences.english: She was watching the film, but he kept pawing at her.
sentences.chinese: 她在看电影，而他却不断地对她动手动脚。

sentences.english: Kim valiantly defends herself as Eli keeps coming.
sentences.chinese: 金姆勇敢地保卫自己，伊菜也继续向她动手动脚。

sentences.english: Mary could not let any boy take liberties with her.
sentences.chinese: 玛丽不让男孩子对她动手动脚。

sentences.english: A: I hate guys who are no talk and all hands.
sentences.chinese: 我讨厌男人不善言辞，只是动手动脚。

sentences.english: I hate guys who arn no talk and all hands.
sentences.chinese: 我讨厌男人不善言辞，只是动手动脚。

sentences.english: Yet more often than not, at some point during the night Tim will begin to start touching Amanda up.
sentences.chinese: 然而提姆经常会在夜晚某个时候起对阿曼达动手动脚。

sentences.english: So do I. I like those guys who are bold but cautious.
sentences.chinese: 我讨厌男人不善言辞，只是动手动脚。
